name: XLSTAT
overview:
“Addinsoft’s leading product suite, XLSTAT, is the most complete data analysis and statistical application available for Microsoft Excel®. Every day more than a hundred people download XLSTAT and its user community has reached over 30000 members. The users are spread out in over 100 countries, from Hong-Kong to Peru and from Norway to South Africa. Over the years XLSTAT has become a focal point in statistics and multivariate analysis. XLSTAT is a must for all analysts, teachers, consultants, students and statistics experts who need a powerful and efficient program for analyzing data.”

Addinsoft’s mission is to give access to statistics and data analysis to everyone through a software suite that is integrated into the familiar environment of Microsoft Excel, with an outstanding value for money, so that people can focus on finding the information hidden in their data.
